definition: Wang Xiaobo (1952-1997), scholar and novelist
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
surname Wang
to rule/to reign over
small/tiny/few/young
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
wave/ripple/storm/surge

sentences.english: To understand Wang's fiction, readers need to understand the relationship between sadism and masochism .
sentences.chinese: 想要理解王小波的小說，必須首先理解虐戀情結。

sentences.english: But this world there is only one Wang Xiaobo, Li Yinhe is also gone.
sentences.chinese: 可是這世上只有一個王小波，還是李銀河的，還走了。

sentences.english: Wang xiaobo depart from Duras, and trends towards Calvino.
sentences.chinese: 王小波背離了杜拉斯，而走向了卡爾維諾。

sentences.english: Running in the Night is one of the representative works of Wang Xiao-bo.
sentences.chinese: 《紅拂夜奔》是王小波的代表作品之一。

sentences.english: Humor and poetry are the most outstanding and unique styles in Wang Xiaobo's novels.
sentences.chinese: 幽默與詩意是王小波小說最鮮明獨特的風格。

sentences.english: WangXiaoBo also opposed the oppression in name of "public".
sentences.chinese: 王小波同樣反對在“大衆”名義下進行的壓迫。
